templateRows.fields: Ad Set Level Average session duration
templateRows.formula: Look up the appropriate campaign name and ads set name from pivot_temp.csv SUM: All numeric field of Average session duration

templateRows.fields: Ad Set Level Users with Session above 1 min
templateRows.formula: Look up the appropriate campaign name and ads set name from pivot_temp.csv SUM: All numeric field of Online store visitors Limit the sum and filter out the users whose session duration is above one minute.
templateRows.notes: Count users with session duration > 1 minute

templateRows.fields: Ad Set Level Cost per 1 min user
templateRows.formula: Ad Set Level Users with Session above 1 min / Ad Set Level Spent

templateRows.fields: Ad Set Level 1min user/ total users (%)
templateRows.formula: Percentage of (Ad Set Level Users with Session above 1 min / Ad Set Level Users)

templateRows.fields: Ad Set Level ATC with session duration above 1 min
templateRows.formula: Look up the appropriate campaign name and ads set name from pivot_temp.csv SUM: All numeric field of Sessions with cart additions, Limit the sum and filter out the users whose session duration is above one minute.

templateRows.fields: Ad Set Level Reached Checkout with session duration above 1 min
templateRows.formula: Look up the appropriate campaign name and ads set name from pivot_temp.csv SUM: All numeric field of Sessions that reached checkout, Limit the sum and filter out the users whose session duration is above one minute.

templateRows.fields: Ad Set Level Users with Above 5 page views and above 1 min
templateRows.formula: Look up the appropriate campaign name and ads set name from pivot_temp.csv SUM: All numeric field of Pageviews, Limit the sum and filter out the users whose session duration is above one minute and have page views above 5
